thread.title: Wall Street Falls After Quarterly Results Disappoint
thread.title_full: Baltimore Jewish Life | Wall Street Falls After Quarterly Results Disappoint

author: Staff Reporter
title: Wall Street Falls After Quarterly Results Disappoint
text:
U.S. stocks fell on Tuesday in the wake of results from IBM and United Technologies that dampened early optimism over earnings season as investors awaited quarterly profits from tech giants including Apple and Microsoft.
The Dow Jones industrial average fell 179.95 points, or 0.99 percent, to 17,920.46, the S&P 500 lost 9.08 points, or 0.43 percent, to 2,119.2 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 10.74 points, or 0.21 percent, to 5,208.12.
Photo Caption: U.S. stocks fell on Tuesday in the wake of results from IBM and United Technologies that dampened early optimism over earnings season as investors awaited quarterly profits from tech giants including Apple and Microsoft.
